        Specified by:
        isExported in interface GpioController
        Parameters:
        pin -
        Returns:

        A value of 'true' is returned if the requested pin is exported.

      • unexport

        public void unexport​(GpioPin... pin)
        Description copied from interface: GpioController
        Unexport a GPIO pin by GpioPin instance. This method will unexport an existing provisoned pin
        Specified by:
        unexport in interface GpioController
        Parameters:
        pin - provisioned GPIO pin instance

      • unexport

        public void unexport​(Pin... pin)
        Description copied from interface: GpioController
        Unexport a GPIO pin by Pin instance. This method will explicitly unexport any Pin whether it has been provisioned in Pi4J or not.
        Specified by:
        unexport in interface GpioController
        Parameters:
        pin - GPIO pin instance (i.e. RaspiPin.GPIO_00)

      • isShutdown

        public boolean isShutdown()
        This method returns TRUE if the GPIO controller has been shutdown.
        Specified by:
        isShutdown in interface GpioController
        Returns:
        shutdown state

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        This method can be called to forcefully shutdown all GPIO controller monitoring, listening, and task threads/executors.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface GpioController
